mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notification (user_id, message, created_at, is_read) VALUES (#{userId}, #{message}, NOW(), 0)
mapper.select: SELECT n.notification_id AS notificationId, n.user_id AS userId, n.message, n.created_at AS createdAt, n.is_read AS isRead, m.nickname AS userNickname FROM notification n JOIN member m ON n.user_id = m.user_id WHERE n.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY n.created_at DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notification WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_read = 0
